newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan power demand seen to grow 2 pct/yr till 2006.
newsitem.headline: Japan power demand seen to grow 2 pct/yr till 2006.

text.p: Japan's electricity demand will grow an average 2 percent per year during the 12-year period between 1995 and 2006, Japan's Electric Power Survey Committee said on Tuesday.

The industry body, comprised of regional power firms and power plant manufacturers, predicted the country's electricity demand in 2006 will total 964 billion Kilowatt hours (KWh), up 24 percent from the 1995 level.
Japan's 10 regional electric utilities draw their long-term plans for investment in plants and facilities based on the forecasts of the committee.
